title: D+ Rank And Second Merged Skill (Part 1)
body:
D+ Rank And Second Merged Skill (Part 1)

After getting cores from Valery, Evan went back to the academy.

Now with these eight cores, he has a total of twenty-seven C rank cores, three C+ rank cores, and one B rank cores.

These cores are still not enough to level up his monarch core to C rank.

During the past three days, Evan thought about the practical exam, and he finally decided to bring his prime core to D+ rank before the exam.

Although Evan knew he is powerful, he is still not sure about dealing against many people at the same time with his current power.

In the details of the exam, it was clearly written that other teams can join hands to deal with a strong monster or different teams of students.

Evan knew he is not good when it come to deal with people who are working in a team.

A clear example of this was his fight against the horned frost wolf on the second floor of the frost world dungeon.
